answerText: molluscs [or Mollusca][10] Animals in this class of molluscs do not have a radula, and instead eat by capturing the phytoplankton from water filtered into their gills. These animals have a hinge separating their two halves.
heading: STIMPY |2015 | Editors 1 | 14 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Like arthropods, these creatures use copper-based haemocyanin for oxygen transport, which makes them tire faster than hemoglobin using vertebrates. For 10 points each: [10] Name this phylum that includes cephalopods like squids and octopi and gastropods like snails and slugs.
